/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the bustling city life. Trees dot the sidewalk, providing a touch of nature amidst the concrete structures. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
